code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import MessengerList from"./MessengerList";import axios from'axios';import folder from"./folder.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[messengers,setMessengers]=useState(null);const[isPending,setIsPending]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchMessengers=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/messengers');setMessengers(response.data);setIsPending(false);}catch(err){setError(err.message);setIsPending(false);}};fetchMessengers();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"messenger-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:folder,alt:"folder"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Messengers"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:error}),isPending&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."}),messengers&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessengerList,{messengers:messengers})]})]});};export default Home;
